titleStmt.title: Peirs Gaueston Earle of Cornvvall His life, death, and fortune.
titleStmt.author: Drayton, Michael, 1563-1631.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I[ames] R[oberts] for N[icholas] L[ing] and Iohn Busby, and are to be sold at the west doore of Paules,

notesStmt.note: Roberts and Ling identified and publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
